00013 #define GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00014    GroupField * variable; \
00015    if ((variable = new GroupField) == NULL) \
00016       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00017    if (area != NULL) \
00018       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00019    if (groupField != NULL) \
00020       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00021    variable->getGroupLayoutData()->setTopLeftMargin(Vector()); \
00022    variable->getGroupLayoutData()->setBottomRightMargin(Vector());
00023 
00024 #define GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00025    bordered, text) \
00026    GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00027    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00028 
00029 #define GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height) \
00030    GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00031    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00032       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00033 
00034 #define GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height) \
00035    GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00036    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00037    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00038       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00039

00041    GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00042    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00043    variable->resizeToMinimum();

00064 #define GLAZIERY_GROUPFIELD_B(variable, area, groupField, text) \
00065    GroupField * variable; \
00066    if ((variable = new GroupField) == NULL) \
00067       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00068    if (area != NULL) \
00069       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00070    if (groupField != NULL) \
00071       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00072    variable->setBordered(true); \
00073    variable->setText(text);
